description:
Save $25 off your first app hotel purchase of $100 or more. To learn more, visit: http://www.expedia.com/privatecoupon

Begin your next journey with the beauty and ease of the Expedia App.

Take advantage of mobile-exclusive deals and book your trip with just a few taps. Access your itineraries on the go and rest easy knowing that we’ll alert you to important information like flight delays and hotel check-out times.

From booking to check-in and beyond, we’re constantly improving our app to enhance your travel experience. Download the Expedia App today.

Save big on hotel rooms:
● Save up to 40% with mobile-exclusive deals
● Sort by price, deals, or reviews
● See reviews from customers who are verified hotel guests

Find the perfect flight:
● Book a flight to nearly anywhere in the world
● Sort by price, duration, or departure and arrival time
● Search by city or airport

Book in a flash:
● Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
● Slide to purchase, and you're on your way!
● Earn triple Expedia+ points on your purchases

See & share your trip information:
● View upcoming travel details
● Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
● Get notifications for flight delays, gate changes, and much more!
releaseNotes:
• New Expedia+ rewards tiers now visible in the app
• Prominent labeling for hotel rooms offering free cancelation
• Clearer pricing for multi-traveler flights
• Bug fixes
